Posts.EditableText: Hi, ¿Is there a way to publish the game directly to a private website? ¿or export it as html? I've been looking on the forum and on the wiki whitout finding any answers. I'm using windows Quest version 5.5 Thanks in advance for your time and help
Posts.HTML:
Hi,

¿Is there a way to publish the game directly to a private website? ¿or export it as html?

I've been looking on the forum and on the wiki whitout finding any answers.

I'm using windows Quest version 5.5

Thanks in advance for your time and help

Posts.EditableText: You can choose to keep the game "unlisted" when uploading. Then it won't be public - only people with the link will be able to play.
Posts.HTML: You can choose to keep the game "unlisted" when uploading. Then it won't be public - only people with the link will be able to play.

Posts.EditableText: Sorry for my bad english, i want to say if there is an option to publish on my own website server . I see the option to embeed it on iframe tags, but someone suggested that on v5 it was posible to put it directly to my own webserver. ¿Is this a real option or the only way is to publish it on the oficial server and the share it? Thanks again
Posts.HTML:
Sorry for my bad english, i want to say if there is an option to publish on my own website server . I see the option to embeed it on iframe tags, but someone suggested that on v5 it was posible to put it directly to my own webserver. ¿Is this a real option or the only way is to publish it on the oficial server and the share it?

Thanks again

Posts.EditableText: You could try using QuestJS to convert your game into HTML, then you can host it anywhere: https://github.com/textadventures/quest-js
Posts.HTML: You could try using QuestJS to convert your game into HTML, then you can host it anywhere: https://github.com/textadventures/quest-js

Posts.EditableText: Thanks Alex, i'll try it with some of my recent creations
Posts.HTML:
Thanks Alex,
i'll try it with some of my recent creations
